parameters.name: ViewName
parameters.description: Name of the standard model view to change; empty string to use ViewId ( see Remarks )

parameters.name: ViewId
parameters.description: View ID as defined in swStandardViews_e ; -1 to use ViewName ( see Remarks )

title: IModelDocExtension.UpdateStandardViews
description: Changes the specified standard view to the current model view.
signature:
System.Boolean UpdateStandardViews( 
   System.String
ViewName
,
   System.Int32
ViewId
)

parameters.name: ViewName
parameters.description: Name of the standard model view to change; empty string to use ViewId ( see Remarks )

parameters.name: ViewId
parameters.description: View ID as defined in swStandardViews_e ; -1 to use ViewName ( see Remarks )

returns: True if the standard model view update is successful, false if not
remarks:
This method works with parts and assemblies only.
If you set both ViewName and ViewId, then ViewId takes precedence if the two arguments do not resolve to the same standard model view.
This method does not support the following standard model views:
swStandardViews_e
.swDimetricView
swStandardViews_e.swIsometricView
swStandardViews_e.swTrimetricView
